title: [Untitled segment on NAIDOC day: Access News 2000]
creator_credit: SKA TV, Campbell Manderson and Pip Starr
brief_description: A look at the National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Day of Celebration. Produced as a news story for SKA TV’s Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne’s Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
